ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] New Macros
ygData.msgSnippet: Just get a SOW and a wide open area and you would be smoking.  At least until Abashi hears about it. Galtin of E ci ... From: Kimes, Dean W.
ygData.messageBody:
Just get a SOW and a wide open area and you would be smoking. At least
until Abashi hears about it.

Galtin of E'ci

-----Original Message-----
From: Kimes, Dean W. [mailto:dean_kimes@...]
Sent: Tuesday, October 03, 2000 8:45 AM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] New Macros


Yes, I was pretty surprised when I tried it as well. It worked very well on
my blue test subjects. I imagine it would be even more effective with two
chants, though harder to lay them both on before recharming.

Kit

-----Original Message-----
From: Gordon Hughes [mailto:ghughes@...]
Sent: Tuesday, October 03, 2000 1:01 PM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] New Macros


>
Yep the Chant still has full effect on the charmed mob. They basically just
sit there and wait to die.
>

Gosh!


/em slowly forms an eeeeveeel grin.
